title: Motokare to wa Dekinakatta Sex Shitemo Ii desu ka?

alternative_titles.ja: 元カレとはできなかったセックスしてもいいですか?

synopsis: Mia, a cute and passionate gamer girl recently ended her relationship with her boyfriend due to the lack of intimacy in their sex life. Feeling unsatisfied and frustrated, Mia opens up about her situation to her close gaming friend, who is also dealing with his own romantic frustrations. What starts as a simple, honest conversation between two friends soon takes an unexpected and steamy turn, as both Mia and her gaming buddy explore desires they've been suppressing.
